api_list.name: Limit Usage
api_list.description: Shows a list of E Numbers that you should limit the usage of
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://e-numbers-api.p.rapidapi.com/limit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "e-numbers-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://e-numbers-api.p.rapidapi.com/limit"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "e-numbers-api.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search for Number
api_list.description:
Allows you to search by text.

Example 102 will get you the E number 102.

It will only show the first result
